scripts.run:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:up --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types
scripts.run:all:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:latest --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types
scripts.rollback:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:rollback --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types
scripts.undo:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:down --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types
